ideas.title: OK, what’s going on with LinkedIn’s algo?
ideas.description: Women ran an experiment to see if LinkedIn's new algo was being sexist and thought they proved it. But there's more complexity involved, experts say.
hooks: How Women Decoded LinkedIn's Secret Algorithm

tips: Use screen recordings showing actual LinkedIn interface
Create clear chapter markers for each algorithmic investigation step
Include picture-in-picture expert commentary during technical breakdown

visualDirection.description: High-contrast blue and white color palette with data visualization overlays. Dynamic motion graphics showing algorithmic flow. Clean, technical typography with bold sans-serif headings. Animated data points and network connection visualizations. Minimalist infographic style with technical precision.

ideas.title: Trump’s AI executive order promises ‘one rulebook’ — startups may get legal limbo instead
ideas.description: Trump signed an AI executive order targeting state laws and promising one national rulebook. Critics warn it could trigger court battles and prolong uncertainty for startups while Congress debates federal rules.
hooks: AI Rules: Trump's Gamble That Could Break Startups
One Rulebook to Bind Them: AI's Legal Minefield
Startup Survival: The Hidden AI Regulation Trap

tips: Use archival footage of tech hearings and Trump executive actions
Include dynamic infographics explaining regulatory complexity
Create chapter markers for complex legal narrative

visualDirection.description: High-contrast blue/gray palette representing legal/tech tension. Geometric typography suggesting structure/regulation. Dynamic motion graphics simulating regulatory flowcharts. Split-screen archival/contemporary footage. Subtle glitch effects symbolizing technological disruption.

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Dramatic AI regulation soundbite
Historical Context: Rise of AI and regulatory challenges
Trump's Executive Order: Detailed policy breakdown
Startup Impact Analysis: Potential legal and economic consequences

ideas.title: You can now have more fluid and expressive conversations when you go Live with Search.
ideas.description: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Searchlive_thumb.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">When you go Live with Search, you can have a back-and-forth voice conversation in AI Mode to get real-time help and quickly find relevant sites across the web. And now, …
hooks: AI Search Just Got Way More Conversational
Talk to Search Like a Real Assistant

tips: Enable live chat interaction during stream
Create interactive polling during live segments

visualDirection.description: Dynamic blue-teal gradient background, floating holographic UI elements simulating search interactions. Clean sans-serif typography with motion-tracked text reveals. Minimalist iconography representing voice/search interactions. Subtle particle animations suggesting real-time data flow. High-contrast color palette emphasizing technological fluidity.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Dramatic Live Search Interaction Reveal
Section 3: Gemini AI Voice Conversation Mechanics
Section 5: Future of Conversational Search Preview

ideas.title: Bringing state-of-the-art Gemini translation capabilities to Google Translate
ideas.description: <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/Translate-Blog-121125.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">We’re bringing Gemini’s state-of-the-art translation model to Google Translate for text, and more new features.
hooks: AI Just Transformed Google Translate Forever
How Google is Rewriting Language Barriers

tips: Use screen recordings of actual translation demos
Include picture-in-picture with presenter explaining technical nuances
Create dynamic chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward aesthetic with electric blue and deep indigo color palette. Dynamic motion graphics showing translation transformations. Clean, sans-serif typography with sharp geometric elements. Animated language transition effects. Minimal but high-energy visual style mimicking AI's precision and creativity.

exampleOutline: Section 5: Future of Language Technology CTA (30-60s)

ideas.title: Google Translate now lets you hear real-time translations in your headphones
ideas.description: The real-time headphone translations experience keeps each speaker’s tone, emphasis, and cadence intact, so it’s easier to follow the conversation and tell who’s saying what.
hooks: Real-Time Translation Magic in Your Headphones

tips: Use picture-in-picture to show device screen and presenter
Create chapter markers for each step of translation process
Include live demo of translation feature in real conversation

visualDirection.description: Dynamic motion graphics showcasing translation process, vibrant tech-inspired color palette (electric blues, clean whites), floating typography with translation language transitions, animated sound wave/language connection visualizations, sleek minimal interface overlays

exampleOutline: Step-by-Step: Setting Up Google Translate Headphone Feature
